=Gene access=

Get the number of Genes available:

    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/count]

Get one Gene by Id (this Id is the internal JBioWH WID that change in all DB):

    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/2629815]

Get from/to Genes by range:

    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/1/3]

Get Gene by Gene Id:

    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/geneid/2947819]

Search Genes by string using % (Search over the fields: Gene ID, ProteinGi, RNANucleotideGi, GenomicNucleotideGi, Gene symbol, locustag, Protein Accession, RNANucleotide Accession, GenomicNucleotide Accession, in this order. Use %25 for the wildcard):

    Gene ID:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/670]

    !ProteinGi:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/75490457]

    RNANucleotideGi:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/14331105]

    !GenomicNucleotideGi:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/160700492]

    Gene symbol:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/aacC]

    Locustag:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/pLeuDn_05]

    Protein Accession:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/NP_047184]

    RNANucleotide Accession:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/AJ288984]

    !GenomicNucleotide Accession:

       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneinfo/search/EU137666]
